body:
### About

[simpl.info](simpl.info) is a website for simple code examples. It's not the place for documentation or cross-platform capability testing.

Your contributions and comments are welcome!

For more information about HTML, CSS and JavaScript, I've made a [list of resources](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kuhUEiIkAUHO0LBBNM4A1Enc5QgVZn3CDkuSoPZJR1U/edit#).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Simpl
tagline: Simplest possible examples of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
